subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Samuel Peter stopped Oleg Maskaev in the final seconds of the sixth round Saturday night in Cancún, Mexico, claiming Maskaev’s World Boxing Council heavyweight title with a flurry of powerful punches.Peter (30-1, 23 knockouts), a Nigerian who trains in Las Vegas, was more powerful and more poised than the 39-year-old Maskaev in front of a capacity crowd at Plaza de Toros, the bullfighting ring in Cancún and the unlikely site of Mexico’s first heavyweight title fight.
